title: Digging Up the Marrow. Official Movie Trailer #1 [HD] (2015)
description:
In theaters: February 20th, 2015

Description:

What if the ghastly images and abominations haunting our collective nightmares actually exist? Writer/director Adam Green (Hatchet) sets out to make a documentary exploring this tantalizing premise after being contacted by a mysterious man named William Dekker (Ray Wise). Determined to expose the truth, Green embarks on a bone-chilling odyssey and gets more than he bargains for when he dares to go Digging Up the Marrow.

Director: Adam Green

Writers: Adam Green

Actors: Adam Green, Ray Wise, Will Barratt, Alex Pardee

Genre: Thriller, Science Fiction, Action and Adventure
